nodes.title: Added the functionality to notify listeners when server list is changed from BaseLoadBalancer.
Make connection pool configuration dynamic
Pull request to address Issue 70
Reopen closed but not merged pull request https://github.com/Netflix/ribbon/pull/64
Updates for 1.x
add helper method to get or create a client with a custom config class
Add client port config override
Fix Issue #63. Fix the problem that NFHttpClient is registered with Servo monitors twice.
Fix Issue #61
add hook for custom ssl factory and AcceptAllSocketFactory implementation
Make sure NamedConnectionPool instances register with Servo with unique names.
Fix RestClient connection leaks when it throws ClientException upon server throttle. Enhanced JUnit tests for RestClient retries.
Upgrade httpasyncclient version to 4.0 GA. Added concurrency and read timeout tests.
Add async HTTP support based on Apache's HttpAsyncClient
Add statics (Servo counters) to measure the efficiency of the default connection pool manager.
Add async HTTP support based on Netty
Fix #39
Adding client auth required to default config. ssl related updates for client auth and keystore introspection
Add Config Key for indicating whether or not Client Auth is Required
Fix #36
show that when used properly, the client does survive many short-lived requests
update to latest archaius and guava
remove jaxrs dep from ribbon-core by making response headers multimap
update to latest gradle template
Deprecate AbstractLoadBalancerAwareClient.getDefaultPort() and replace with getDefaultPortFromScheme(String) with a default implementation.
Make DynamicServerListLoadBalancer.updateListOfServers() public to provide alternative way to update servers at runtime instead of relying on scheduler.
Add subset filter for server list
addServer to not modify parameter

Change zone from static to member variable in ZoneAffinityPredicate as in some cases zone may be set when the instance is created. Change the throw clause from HttpClientResponse to general Exception for easy sub-classing
Issue #22. Also some effort to reduce monitor metrics.
Fix Issue #19.
Fix Issue #19
Increased default max connection retries for priming.
Add debugging for prime connections.
Ensure zone stats and metrics do not contain stale data for zones that no longer have servers.
Register the rule as a monitor object to expose the available servers count metric for AvailabilityFilteringRule.
Fix junit test.
Enable junit tests logging
Make ZoneAwareLoadBalancer's rule object for each zone configurable. Avoid duplicated connection priming at client initialization.
version and header update
Fixed issues with SimpleVipAddressResolver and ConfigurationBasedServerList
Change to IRule interface to remove LB from method signature. Fix issue #6.
